global.ia: Find out more about the main themes by clicking below.

header.top: Go to the top of the page

modal.suggestion: Answer to all your questions with Artificial Intelligence (AI)
modal.exploreText: Delve into specific subjects that pique your interest.
modal.sourcesText: Discover the verified sources our AI uses to generate each answer.

prompt.warning: Though generated from verified sources, this AI's answers may contain approximations.
prompt.error: I don't have enough reliable sources to provide an appropriate answer. Could you please rephrase your question or ask a new one?

feed.sources: Watch the sessions that shaped your answer
feed.document_sources: Access the reply sourced from certified documents
feed.archive: We only archive your last 5 questions.
feed.retrieve: If you want to find a previous answer, you can simply ask it again!
feed.answer_document: May I access the reply sourced from certified documents:
feed.sources_answer: Here are the sources of this response:
feed.sources_document: Can I consult this documentary source?
feed.sources_video: Can I consult this video source?
feed.answer_sources_document: The document on which the AI's response was based is as follows:
feed.answer_sources_video: Here is the video extract of
feed.answer_sources_video_2: which helped to fuel the response.
feed.answer_sources_video_time: The passage used to answer your question comes at this point in the video:
feed.answer_sources_video_extract: Press the Play button to go directly to the right moment in the extract.

sidebar.panoramic: Find out more about our tool

error.no_page: We are unable to find the page you are looking for.

cookies.functional: To view the video, please accept functional cookies.

reassurance.main_text: Explore the artificial intelligence that enhances your understanding.
reassurance.what_text: Our platform, fueled solely by public and certified documents, simplifies complex subjects with different levels of answers tailored to everyone.
reassurance.why_text: This tool is a platform that uses Artificial Intelligence that complex subjects accessible to citizens and facilitate their active participation in democratic discussions.
reassurance.who_text: Whether you're a curious citizen, a journalist seeking a summary, a concerned party looking for clear answers, each user can find information without getting lost in pages of specialised documents.
reassurance.how_help: Our Artificial Intelligence guides you in your learning journey
reassurance.sources_subtitle: Our AI only uses public and reliable documents to formulate its answers.
reassurance.sources_text: Our Artificial Intelligence uses sources that are carefully selected, verified, and moderated by Make.org. The answers you receive during your experience on our platform come from public documents and are generated using AI technology (based on RAG - Retrieval-Augmented Generation), explained at the bottom of the page.
reassurance.warning_docs: Currently, our AI uses video and text sources independently. The initial response is derived from video sources. Inside our AI’s answer, you’ll see this button:
reassurance.warning_docs_2: By clicking, you will access the response that is exclusively sourced from written documents.
reassurance.exchange_title: By taking the form of a conversation
reassurance.exchange_subtitle: To get the most out of our tool, you should interact with our AI in a conversational tone.
reassurance.exchange_text: Communicate as you would with a human by structuring your questions so as to get relevant answers.
reassurance.exchange_text_2: Please be specific and targeted in your questions, avoiding generalities for a more tailored experience.
reassurance.ex_text: What were the main proposals during this event?
reassurance.or_text: What were the most controversial proposals during the event?
reassurance.warning_exchange: For the moment, our AI does not yet have conversational capabilities. Previously asked questions will not be retained. Therefore, you cannot refer to your previous questions.
reassurance.seek_title: By assisting you in finding what you're looking for
reassurance.seek_subtitle: Three ways to explore the platform, three ways to find the right answer.
reassurance.seek_text: To help you get acquainted with the tool and access your information, our AI offers three different routes:
reassurance.sug_text: Predefined questions if you're not sure where to start.
reassurance.themes_text: Explore topics to gain a deeper understanding of important subjects.
reassurance.auto_text: Express yourself freely and receive answers to all your questions.
reassurance.how_work_title: Demystifying our AI: A Closer Look
reassurance.rag_text_1: , or Retrieval-Augmented Generation, is an advanced AI technology that combines information retrieval from carefully selected documents to generate its’ answer.
reassurance.rag_text_2: Imagine asking a question to an expert who, instead of going through every book in the library, knows exactly where to look for relevant information.
reassurance.rag_text_3: This 'library' consists of public and reliable documents and videos specifically chosen by Make.org.
reassurance.data_text: Our tool has been specifically designed to ensure the protection of your personal data. To learn more, please refer to our privacy policy below.
reassurance.doc_access: Access the reply sourced from certified documents
reassurance.sources_origin_text_header: Our IA is sourced in a multi-documentary basis to produce its responses.
reassurance.sources_origin_text_bullet_1: An official video base is transcribed and verified to save you time of viewing without losing information.
reassurance.sources_origin_text_bullet_2: Certified documents are also used as a source by our IA, which simplifies them to facilitate understanding of all.

welcome.title: @@welcome.title|fr:Demander, Comprendre
welcome.exergue: @@welcome.exergue|fr:Cet outil est une plateforme qui utilise l’Intelligence Artificielle pour rendre accessible la compréhension des sujets complexes pour les citoyens.
